body: Tested in Safari. I don't see any issue.
Thanks, @Sybren-UU will test Edge. Firefox is left.
Tested today on Firefox. No problems whatsoever that I could identify.

Tested Edge. It works well in Edge. The undo button stays longer on the screening page than in Safari, this is good because in other browsers the undo button goes away too fast sometimes. Importing and exporting projects works.
Thanks @Sybren-UU. @emielvdveen any idea how this is possible?
@J535D165 Hmm that's strange. The Material UI `Snackbar` has a `autoHideDuration` which is set to 6s. Could it be that something else triggers the snackbar to hide somehow?
